radiographic_examinations.findings: No pleural effusion. Ill-defined hypodensity within segment 4B of the liver, likely a perfusional defect. Normal gallbladder without gallstones. Normal spleen, pancreas, kidneys, distally normal esophagus, stomach, and small and large bowel. Appendix measures 7 mm with mild mucosal hyperenhancement and no adjacent fat stranding. No lymphadenopathy, free abdominal fluid, or pneumoperitoneum.
